Unitron/Hades/Sixshot/Serpentor/Koga Shuko:



Serpentor heard a whistling sound, turning he saw a missile heading for him.  
Jumping backwards, the rocket exploded, sending him through the air, landing 
on his back. 

---

Hades raised his rifle, taking precise aim.  Pulling the trigger back twice, 
he smiled as two bolts headed for Zardus.

---

Sixshot shook in his tank mode as a rocket struck him, taking out the back 
half of that mode.  Swerving the cannon, he fired a powerful sonic blast at 
Perndabot's torso.

---

Koga Shuko raised his missile launcher, firing it off at the Ark.

---

Unitron fell back several feet as shots hit him.  Looking up as he could 
smell slightly scorched metal, he saw Zardus.  Firing two optic blasts, he 
raised both laser rifles, firing four bolts each, a total of 10 laser beams 
heading for the Alliance's leader.
